item.title: Report I-2025020067
item.description:
Report I-2025020067

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-05T00:52:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-10
  • City: BALTIMORE
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: QUALITY CARRIERS INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During unloading operation facility personnel failed to verify all valves and closures on storage tank were closed and secured before unloading operation began. As unloading started, product was released from a closure which was not closed on the storage tank. Operations halted and closure sealed on storage tank. Unloading completed without additional ihcident. Facility personnel cleaned released material.
